articles.description: Coco Gauff faces Karolina Muchova in the US Open women's semi-finals before Aryna Sabalenka plays Madison Keys - live radio and text.
articles.title: US Open semi-finals: Gauff v Muchova - radio & text

articles.description: American teenager Coco Gauff is into her first US Open singles final after beating Karolina Muchova in a semi-final disrupted by protesters.
articles.title: Gauff reaches first US Open final after protest

articles.description: The occasion and history have ramped up expectations for France's Rugby World Cup opener against the All Blacks in Paris.
articles.title: A Rugby World Cup opener without equal

articles.description: Northern Ireland's hopes of qualifying for Euro 2024 are all but over after a 4-2 defeat by Slovenia in Ljubljana.
articles.title: Slovenia all but end NI's Euro 2024 hopes

articles.description: England have a real sense of "optimism and belief" before their opening game World Cup game against Argentina on Saturday, says lock Maro Itoje.
articles.title: England filled with 'optimism and belief' - Itoje

articles.description: The Saudi Pro League transfer deadline shuts to end a record-breaking summer of spending - but no Mohamed Salah as he stays at Liverpool.
articles.title: Saudi deadline closes with Salah staying at Anfield

articles.description: Rob Herring says he will put his "best foot forward" for Ireland in their World Cup opener against Romania on Saturday.
articles.title: Irish hooker Herring 'raring to go' against Romania

articles.description: WBC heavyweight champion Tyson Fury says he'll be "disappointed if there's not war" in his fight with former UFC heavyweight champion Francis Ngannou in October.
articles.title: 'I'll be disappointed if it's not war' - Fury

articles.description: Wales prepare for Monday's crucial Euro 2024 qualifier in Latvia with a goalless friendly at home to South Korea.
articles.title: Wales and South Korea play out goalless friendly

articles.description: Ben Stokes says there is a "very good plan in place" to attempt to fix the long-term problem with his left knee.
articles.title: Stokes has 'very good plan' for knee injury
